title: Directx - VGA Problem
body:
an unknown directx error has occurred and league of legends cannot start . please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the Manufacturer 

I got everything in latset version
Plz help !

replies.body: Me too! I did all i could, but still dont working. And i get a penalty for that T_T. Im in the last qeue.

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and delete game.cfg file, after that launch the game. 
Try that.

For me the problem was exactly here:
Height=1080
Width=1920


Changing it to:
Height=900
Width=1600
(or other resolution supported by your monitor) solved the issue, without loosing other configs



You're welcome Rito for finding cause for you..

> [{quoted}](name=420DrugsAreBad,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=d5v9PkEY,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-03T12:04:46.858+0000)
>
> For me the problem was exactly here:
> Height=1080
> Width=1920
> 
> 
> Changing it to:
> Height=900
> Width=1600
> (or other resolution supported by your monitor) solved the issue, without loosing other configs
> 
> 
> 
> You're welcome Rito for finding cause for you..

I can confirm this as well. For some reason my height was changed to 1200 instead of 1080. Changing and saving this fixed it for me.

This may be related to the custom resolution issues we've been seeing today.  Resetting your settings to default by deleting your config folder should fix this up in the meantime.

> Delete your Config folder. This is typically found at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
> 

Let me know if the issue persists!

Hey, thanks for your answer

As I posted above:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/d5v9PkEY-directx-vga-problem?comment=000100000000

It was related to resolution but not the custom one. For me the case was that sometimes i'm playing on external screen (Full HD), sometimes i play on laptops screen (1600x900). Before it was switching properly, but after 7.9 was implemented this setting is not changing dynamically. I see that you are relating to custom resolution but it's not true for everyone, so I hope it helps you guys. Good luck

Yeah, that sucks.  :/  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as we prefer to look into situations like this in a case by case basis.  I can't make any guarantees, but it's worth a shot.  See you there!
Deleting game.cfg was the only thing that fixed it for me. Updated DX, vidya drivers, game repair... Nothing but deleting worked.

Yeah same here. 
I tried repairing ,i tried  downloading  directx again , i tried re-installing the whole game and i get this same message every single time.

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and delete game.cfg file, after that launch the game.

I saw that on another post i read and my game worked @SalamaPsycho
thank you thank you thank you

Hello Everyone, I'm having the Same problem, I'm deleting That File ( Game.cfg ) and IT keeps coming back ... I still need to update my drivers though .... I've tried everything you said but The game just won't open .... HELP !
